title: Cisco WebEx
paragraphs: The centre provides continuous help and support for the CISCO WebEx issues to the students, faculty and the staff; so that their research and academic activities will remain unaffected.
The WebEx meeting can be joined from desktop/ laptop (Windows/Mac) and Mobile.
Below are the procedures followed for using Cisco WebEx in IITK Environment:

links.text: How to join Cisco WebEx Meeting
How to start Cisco WebEx Meeting
